lines.text: I bet the <c=#0000FF>Stop Wizard</c> was involved in his death somehow...
Not lookin' for a culprit just yet, Seeker. I want an actual cause of death!
So, like, one of his spells, then?
Maybe. If a Stop Wizard can cast ''Blast Hole In Chest'', then sure.
Now, that isn't a spell, but it should be, and I should have it.
Well, you're lucky you don't. We certainly wouldn't let you walk the streets if you did.
